Welcome to the Intelligent Systems Lab!

We are a research group at the University of Beira Interior focused on advancing the frontiers of computer vision.

Explore Our Research →

Vision Beyond the Visible

Our lab specializes in computer vision research that extends across multiple domains and applications.

Biometric Recognition

Advancing the state-of-the-art in iris, periocular, and face recognition.

Medical Image Analysis

Developing algorithms to assist in medical diagnosis and treatment planning.

Visual Surveillance

Creating advanced systems for security and behavioral analysis.
